segment.source: title: Performance
segment.target: title: Performance

segment.source: description: Users expect their apps to remain responsive, to feel natural, and not to drain their battery.
segment.target: description: Users expect their apps to remain responsive, to feel natural, and not to drain their battery.

segment.source: Performance
segment.target: Performance

segment.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]

segment.source: Users expect their apps to remain responsive, to feel natural, and not to drain their battery.
segment.target: Users expect their apps to remain responsive, to feel natural, and not to drain their battery.

segment.source: Technically, performance is a non-functional requirement but treating performance as a feature will help you deliver on your users' expectations.
segment.target: Technically, performance is a non-functional requirement but treating performance as a feature will help you deliver on your users' expectations.

segment.source: Specifying goals, and measuring, are key factors.
segment.target: Specifying goals, and measuring, are key factors.

segment.source: Determine what your performance-critical scenarios are; define what good performance mean.
segment.target: Determine what your performance-critical scenarios are; define what good performance mean.

segment.source: Then measure early and often enough throughout the lifecycle of your project to be confident you'll hit your goals..
segment.target: Then measure early and often enough throughout the lifecycle of your project to be confident you'll hit your goals..

segment.source: This section shows you how to organize your performance workflow, fix animation glitches and frame rate problems, and tune your startup time, page navigation time, and memory usage.
segment.target: This section shows you how to organize your performance workflow, fix animation glitches and frame rate problems, and tune your startup time, page navigation time, and memory usage.

segment.source: If you haven't done so already, a step that we've seen result in significant performance improvements is just porting your app to target Windows 10.
segment.target: If you haven't done so already, a step that we've seen result in significant performance improvements is just porting your app to target Windows 10.

segment.source: Several XAML optimizations (for example, {x:Bind}) are only available in Windows 10 apps.
segment.target: Several XAML optimizations (for example, {x:Bind}) are only available in Windows 10 apps.

segment.source: See Porting apps to Windows 10 and the //build/ session Moving to the Universal Windows Platform.
segment.target: See Porting apps to Windows 10 and the //build/ session Moving to the Universal Windows Platform.

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Planning for performance
segment.target: Planning for performance

segment.source: Users expect their apps to remain responsive, to feel natural, and not to drain their battery.
segment.target: Users expect their apps to remain responsive, to feel natural, and not to drain their battery.

segment.source: Technically, performance is a non-functional requirement but treating performance as a feature will help you deliver on your users' expectations.
segment.target: Technically, performance is a non-functional requirement but treating performance as a feature will help you deliver on your users' expectations.

segment.source: Specifying goals, and measuring, are key factors.
segment.target: Specifying goals, and measuring, are key factors.

segment.source: Determine what your performance-critical scenarios are; define what good performance mean.
segment.target: Determine what your performance-critical scenarios are; define what good performance mean.

segment.source: Then measure early and often enough throughout the lifecycle of your project to be confident you'll hit your goals.
segment.target: Then measure early and often enough throughout the lifecycle of your project to be confident you'll hit your goals.

segment.source: ListView and GridView UI optimization
segment.target: ListView and GridView UI optimization

segment.source: Improve GridView performance and startup time through UI virtualization, element reduction, and progressive updating of items.
segment.target: Improve GridView performance and startup time through UI virtualization, element reduction, and progressive updating of items.

segment.source: ListView and GridView data virtualization
segment.target: ListView and GridView data virtualization

segment.source: Improve GridView performance and startup time through data virtualization.
segment.target: Improve GridView performance and startup time through data virtualization.

segment.source: Improve garbage collection performance
segment.target: Improve garbage collection performance

segment.source: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps written in C# and Visual Basic get automatic memory management from the .NET garbage collector.
segment.target: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps written in C# and Visual Basic get automatic memory management from the .NET garbage collector.

segment.source: This section summarizes the behavior and performance best practices for the .NET garbage collector in UWP apps.
segment.target: This section summarizes the behavior and performance best practices for the .NET garbage collector in UWP apps.

segment.source: Keep the UI thread responsive
segment.target: Keep the UI thread responsive

segment.source: Users expect an app to remain responsive while it does computation, regardless of the type of machine.
segment.target: Users expect an app to remain responsive while it does computation, regardless of the type of machine.

segment.source: This means different things for different apps.
segment.target: This means different things for different apps.

segment.source: For some, this translates to providing more realistic physics, loading data from disk or the web faster, quickly presenting complex scenes and navigating between pages, finding directions in a snap, or rapidly processing data.
segment.target: For some, this translates to providing more realistic physics, loading data from disk or the web faster, quickly presenting complex scenes and navigating between pages, finding directions in a snap, or rapidly processing data.

segment.source: Regardless of the type of computation, users want their app to act on their input and eliminate instances where it appears unresponsive while it "thinks".
segment.target: Regardless of the type of computation, users want their app to act on their input and eliminate instances where it appears unresponsive while it "thinks".

segment.source: Optimize your XAML markup
segment.target: Optimize your XAML markup

segment.source: Parsing XAML markup to construct objects in memory is time-consuming for a complex UI.
segment.target: Parsing XAML markup to construct objects in memory is time-consuming for a complex UI.

segment.source: Here are some things you can do to improve XAML markup parse and load time and memory efficiency for your app.
segment.target: Here are some things you can do to improve XAML markup parse and load time and memory efficiency for your app.

segment.source: Optimize your XAML layout
segment.target: Optimize your XAML layout

segment.source: Layout can be an expensive part of a XAML app—both in CPU usage and memory overhead.
segment.target: Layout can be an expensive part of a XAML app—both in CPU usage and memory overhead.

segment.source: Here are some simple steps you can take to improve the layout performance of your XAML app.
segment.target: Here are some simple steps you can take to improve the layout performance of your XAML app.

segment.source: MVVM and language performance tips
segment.target: MVVM and language performance tips

segment.source: This topic discusses some performance considerations related to your choice of software design patterns, and programming language.
segment.target: This topic discusses some performance considerations related to your choice of software design patterns, and programming language.

segment.source: Best practices for your app's startup performance
segment.target: Best practices for your app's startup performance

segment.source: Create UWP apps with optimal startup times by improving the way you handle launch and activation.
segment.target: Create UWP apps with optimal startup times by improving the way you handle launch and activation.

segment.source: Optimize animations, media, and images
segment.target: Optimize animations, media, and images

segment.source: Create Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps with smooth animations, high frame rate, and high-performance media capture and playback.
segment.target: Create Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps with smooth animations, high frame rate, and high-performance media capture and playback.

segment.source: Optimize suspend/resume
segment.target: Optimize suspend/resume

segment.source: Create UWP apps that streamline their use of the process lifetime system to resume efficiently after suspension or termination.
segment.target: Create UWP apps that streamline their use of the process lifetime system to resume efficiently after suspension or termination.

segment.source: Optimize file access
segment.target: Optimize file access

segment.source: Create UWP apps that access the file system efficiently, avoiding performance issues due to disk latency and memory/CPU cycles.
segment.target: Create UWP apps that access the file system efficiently, avoiding performance issues due to disk latency and memory/CPU cycles.

segment.source: Windows Runtime Components and optimizing interop
segment.target: Windows Runtime Components and optimizing interop

segment.source: Create UWP apps that use UWP Components and interop between native and managed types while avoiding interop performance issues.
segment.target: Create UWP apps that use UWP Components and interop between native and managed types while avoiding interop performance issues.

segment.source: Tools for profiling and performance
segment.target: Tools for profiling and performance

segment.source: Microsoft provides several tools to help you improve the performance of your UWP app.
segment.target: Microsoft provides several tools to help you improve the performance of your UWP app.
